using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder;

namespace TestAssembly;

[global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("Shiny.Mediator.AspNet.SourceGenerators", "4.0.0")]
public static class MediatorEndpoints
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Maps all generated mediator endpoints
    /// </summary>
    public static global::Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IEndpointRouteBuilder MapGeneratedMediatorEndpoints(this global::Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.IEndpointRouteBuilder builder)
    {

        // Group: /users
        var group__users = builder.MapGroup("/users");

        // UserHandler - GetUser
        group__users.MapMediatorGet<global::Test.GetUserRequest, global::Test.UserResponse>(
            "/{id}"
        )
            .WithName("GetUser")
            .ExcludeFromDescription()
        ;

        // UserHandler - UpdateUser
        group__users.MapMediatorPut<global::Test.UpdateUserCommand>(
            "/{id}"
        )
            .WithName("UpdateUser")
        ;

        // UserHandler - DeleteUser
        group__users.MapMediatorDelete<global::Test.DeleteUserCommand>(
            "/{id}"
        )
            .WithName("DeleteUser")
            .ExcludeFromDescription()
        ;
        return builder;
    }
}
